CONFIRM.APPROVE_CRDRAFT: Apakah anda menyetujui contract requisition ini?
CONFIRM.REJECT_CRDRAFT: Apakah anda ingin menolak contract requisition ini?

CSMS_Q.IS_SUPERVISED: Will the work supervised by contractors
CSMS_Q.IS_ASSESSED: Has the project manager do a risk assesment
CSMS_Q.IS_HIGHRISK: Is it a contract with high risk overall impact

FORM.CONTRACT_DETAIL_DESC: indicate contract title which accurately describes the work to be contracted
FORM.DIRECT_AWARD_DESC: if this requirement is a direct award , please provide a detailed justification on the Direct Award Justification Form
FORM.BUDGET_STATUS_DESC: Is contract listed on  the budget working plan and annual procurement list?

DIRECT_AWARD.FORM_DESC: Your approval is requested to initiate a direct award action
DIRECT_AWARD.DESC_OF_REQUESTED_SERVICE_DESC: Describe the full scope of work contemplated including installation if required; items should include brand, model and part number if applicable
DIRECT_AWARD.SCHEDULE_DESC: Identify the date you need services/items to be delivered OR number of week/months work is to be performed or items delivered. Prepare all document within 3 weeks
DIRECT_AWARD.SOLE_SOURCE_RATIONALE_DESC: Explain why the recommended company is the only company who can perform the service. Address the following:  Are there any other companies who can do this job? What condition (e.g. technological superiority, or performance risks, etc.) exists so that the recommended company has a significant advantage over any other company who can do this job? It is important to sufficiently address the major reasons for conducting noncompetitive procurement, avoiding peripheral issues which detract from the main reasons and reduce the credibility of the justification.  The rational must be clear and convincing, avoiding generalities and unsupported conclusions. Use one or more of the following as applicable.
DIRECT_AWARD.ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_DESC: I am aware of PTVI's requirements for competitive bidding for purchase of goods/services and the criteria for justification for a Direct Award.  I have gathered the required technical information and have made a concerted effort to review comparable/equal services/equipment (e.g., market research).  I have attached the pertinent documentation showing what market research was conducted to preclude other services/items from consideration.

DA_CHECKLIST.HEADER: A specific contractor is the only source of the required item because (check all that apply):
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_0: The required items/services are proprietary to the Supplier/Contractor
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_2: -   to be compatible or interchangeable with existing hardware,
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_4: -   for the repair or modification of existing hardware, or
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_6: It is not possible to obtain competition (i.e., only one source is capable of supplying the items or meeting the requirements).
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_6I: In a brief explanation, provide supporting evidence for the conclusion; other sources considered should be identified and why they are not able to meet the requirements.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_7: There is a substantial technical risk in contracting with any other contractor, thereby making that an unacceptable course of action (e.g., where only one contractor has been successful to date in implementing a difficult manufacturing process).
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_7I: In a brief concise explanation, provide supporting evidence of other contractors with relevant capabilities and emphasize their inability to overcome the substantial technical risk.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_8: For support services effort, there is no reasonable expectation that a meaningful cost or other improvement could be made in the incumbent contractor's performance (e.g., the chances of another firm winning a competition are clearly remote.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_8I: Please provide a brief concise explanation here.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_9: Emergency. During emergency situation, such as major break down, incidents or accidents which are immediately threatening or have caused or have high probability of escalating to cause significant production loss, loss of life, health detriments, property damage or environmental damage, direct award procurement can be triggered as part of efforts to prevent a worsening of situation. In the framework of integrated risk management (FIRM) currently used by PTVI, it is all incident/accidents with severity factors >= 30.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_9I: Please provide a brief concise explanation here.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_10: Special Circumstances. There might be any other special circumstances that may be relevant such as confidential investigations, copyright restrictions, social/political concern, time constraints, part of the exception list or sole availability at the location.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_10I: Please provide a brief explanation and supporting evidence here. For social/political concerns, acknowledgement from External Relation Department and or other related department is required. Attach the written acknowledgement from area of expertise
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_11: Time Constraints- If time constraints, other than emergency, are applicable, identify the following:
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_11_1: -  Is contract part of the annual procurement plan
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_11_2: -  When procurement was on notice of the need for the services,
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_11_3: -  The entity that imposed the constraints,
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_11_4: -  Explain the authority (if not obvious) of that entity to impose them, and
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_11_5: -  Provide the timelines for work to be accomplished.
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_12: Geographic Limitation- If the proposed contractor is the only source available in the geographical area, state the basis for this conclusion and the rationale for limiting the size of the geographical area selected
DA_CHECKLIST.CHK_12I: Please provide a brief explanation here.

SOWA.SOWA_NOT_SAVED: Data SOWA ini masih belum disimpan

CE.NO_ADD_SUB_COST: Tidak diperbolehkan menambah sub-cost lagi karena sub-cost ini sudah diisi dengan CE line
CE.NO_ADD_LINE_COST: Tidak diperbolehkan menambah CE line karena sub-cost ini sudah memiliki sub-cost lain di bawahnya.
CE.CONFIRM_DEL_CESUB: Yakin untuk menghapus sub cost estimate ini?
